ComicInfo.Summary:
FINAL ISSUE!!! Dead End's epic fight with Black Snake comes to a head- and only one will get to leave with theirs intact. Meanwhile, the story of Dead End's origin reaches a high point with his first act as a disgruntled vigilante causing him to explode onto the scene. Dead End's fate is uncertain at best...but what else do you expect from a total bad ass? Don't miss the shocking conclusion to the saga of Dead End!
*Notes:* The first cover is a homage of the cover of The Amazing Spider-Man #129.The second cover is a homage of the cover of The New Mutants #100.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-09 16:32:25. [CVDB450564]
ComicInfo.Editor: Hannah Gorfinkel Elder, Joseph Rybandt, Molly Mahan
ComicInfo.Characters: Awesome, Black Snake, Dead End, Destroyer, Goddess, Grass Snake, Jellyfish Man, Purple Shield, Space Shiva
